If not updated, the deserialized rate will be\nzero with no way to distinguish if an update was intended.\nREF: #2373"},"description":{"description":"Description defines a validator description.","type":"object","properties":{"details":{"description":"details define other optional details.","type":"string"},"identity":{"description":"identity defines an optional identity signature (ex.
